Author: fishonthesun
Text: Tbh, if you hear that again, start polite and say "I appreciate your concern, but I'd like it if you didn't comment on my body"  And if they do it again, just get mean. Say "oh, are we discussing my body again even though I asked you not to? In that case, has anyone ever told you that your...... (insert something about their body" That would teach them a lesson.  It's never cool to comment on someone's body if they dont ask you to
